item.title: Adda add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "If you remember me, then I don't care if everyone else forgets." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Adda add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "But I didn't understand then. That I could hurt somebody so badly she would never recover. That a person can, just by living, damage another human being beyond repair." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Adda add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Lost opportunities, lost possibilities, feelings we can never get back. That's part of what it means to be alive. But inside our heads - at least that's where I imagine it - there's a little room where we store those memories. A room like the stacks in this library. And to understand the workings of our own heart we have to keep on making new reference cards. We have to dust things off every once in awhile, let in fresh air, change the water in the flower vases. In other words, you'll live forever in your own private library." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Adda add a quote by haruki murakami
item.description: "No matter how much suffering you went through, you never wanted to let go of those memories." -- haruki murakami

item.title: Adda add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Listen up - there's no war that will end all wars." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Adda add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "In this world, there are things you can only do alone, and things you can only do with somebody else. It's important to combine the two in just the right amount." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Adda add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Silence, I discover, is something you can actually hear." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Adda add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Letters are just pieces of paper," I said. "Burn them, and what stays in your heart will stay; keep them, and what vanishes will vanish." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Adda add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "A certain type of perfection can only be realized through a limitless accumulation of the imperfect." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Adda add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "The light of morning decomposes everything." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Adda add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Spend your money on the things money can buy. Spend your time on the things money canâ€™t buy." -- Haruki Murakami
